meanings.definition: In a very attentive and detail-oriented manner.
meanings.sent1: She fastidiously checked her work for any mistakes before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: He always works fastidiously to ensure everything is done perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The cat fastidiously groomed itself, making sure every hair was in place.
meanings.sent4: The detective fastidiously examined the crime scene for any clues.
meanings.sent5: The artist fastidiously painted each stroke with precision and care.

meanings.definition: Showing great care and attention to detail.
meanings.sent1: The fastidiously crafted model ship looked incredibly realistic.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her fastidiously organized desk at work.
meanings.sent3: The fastidiously wrapped gift had an elaborate bow on top.
meanings.sent4: The fastidiously designed garden was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: His fastidiously chosen words conveyed his deep emotions.

meanings.sent1: The fastidiously picky eater would only eat food prepared a certain way.
meanings.sent2: She was fastidiously critical of every detail in the project.
meanings.sent3: The fastidiously organized event left no room for error.
meanings.sent4: His fastidiously high standards made it challenging to please him.
meanings.sent5: The fastidiously clean freak insisted on everything being spotless.
